title: E3 2022 Will Be Online-Only Again - Kinda Funny Games Daily 01.07.22
description:
Go to http://upstart.com/kindafunny to find out how Upstart can lower your monthly rate.

Go to http://buyraycon.com/kindafunny to get 15% off your Raycon order.

Go to http://expressvpn.com/kindafunny to get 3 months free on a 1-year package.

Tam and Tim discuss the latest E3 updates, a potential Mario Kart 9, and an update on the Days Gone story.

Time Stamps -

James Davis (@JamesDavisMakes)

Pranksy
The Roper Report   -

00:19:35 - Fallout TV Series Going Into Production This Year, Westworld Creator To Direct
00:25:56 - Mario Kart 9 Is Reportedly In Development With A "New Twist"
00:34:30 - Ads
00:37:34 - The Magic Circle studio working on South Park game
00:40:58 - Update: Days Gone Sales Numbers Likely Lower Than 8 Million After Director Reveals Source Was Site That Tracks Trophies
00:47:10 - Out today
00:48:50 - You‘re Wrong
00:51:55 - Post Show
